Gracie Town1,2,3,4

F, #87368, b. 5 August 1904

Father*: Lionel Herbert Town2 b. 18 Mar 1880, d. 12 Oct 1956

Mother*: Lottie Jane Samis2 b. 19 Sep 1885, d. 12 Dec 1938

Birth*: 5 August 1904; Brighton Twp., Orland, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Biirth Reg'n.#031533: Name: Grace Mae Towns; Date: Aug 9 1905; Parents: Lional Towns & Lottie Samis; Inf.: Lionel towns, farmer, Brighton Twp.; Phys.: G.H. Wade; Reg'd.: Oct 14 1905; Reg'r.: Fred O. Wade, Brighton Twp. (Ontario Birth Registration, #031533-1905, ancestry.com) Date 1905 & location Ont. per 1921 Census. Date Aug 1905 & location Ont. per 1911 Census.2,5,4

Census*: 1911; Brighton Twp., Orland, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 5 at 1911 Census: see Lional Town2

Census: 1921; Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 16 at 1921 Census: see Lionel Town4

Note*: circa 1930; Brighton Twp., Orland, Norrthumberland Co., Ontario; Gracie Town appears in The Latimer Photos which were taken by Hugh Latimer during the early 1920s and late 1930s at his father's General Store in Orland. (The Latimer Photos, Codrington Public Library)6

Residence*: 1938; Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; The name "Grace Towns" is included on the Hilton WI Quilt which was made in 1938.7

Residence: 1940; Brighton Twp., Orland, Northumberland Co., Ontario; "225 Towns, Miss Grace, spinster, Orland" Canada Voter Lists, 1940, Northumberland Co, Brighton Twp., pg. 28 of 124, ancestry.ca.8

Residence: 1949; Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; "307 Towns, Miss Grace, housekeeper, Brighton" Canada Voter Lists, 1949, Northumberland Co, Brighton Twp., pg. 51 of 156, ancestry.ca.8

Residence: 1962; R. R. # 3, Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; "269 Towns, Grace, widow, R.R. 3, Brighton" Canada Voter Lists, 1962, Northumberland Co, Brighton Twp., pg. 75 of 199, ancestry.ca.8

Citations

Grace Towns per Birth Reg'n. Gracie Towns per 1921 Census.

Nellie Gertrude Steenburg1,2,3,4,5,6

F, #87377, b. 18 May 1884, d. 31 October 1907

Father*: George William Steenburg2 b. 19 Aug 1855, d. c 1895

Mother*: Alfretta Fostina Kemp2 b. Aug 1854, d. 8 May 1940

Birth*: 18 May 1884; Ernestown Twp., Odessa, Lennox & Addington Co., Ontario; Birth Reg'n.#017156: Name: Nellie Gertrude Steenburg; Date: May 12 1884; Parents: George W. Steenburg & Alfreta Kemp; Inf.: G. W. Steenburg, Miller, Odessa; Reg'd.: Jun 23 1884; Phys.: Mrs. Shales; Reg'r.: P. A. Maher (Ontario Birth Registration, #017156-1884, ancestry.com) Date May 18 1884 per Memorial. Date May 11 1884 & location Odessa, Ont. per Death Reg'n. - age 23y 5m 20d at death Oct 31 1907. Date Sep 17 1884 & location Ont. rural per 1901 Census. Date 1884 & location Ont. per 1891 Census. Date 1884 & location Prince Edward Co. per marr. reg'n.

Note: Date in Birth Reg'n. is confused, written over; the 2 was scratched out and 2 written above - but the 1 before is pretty clear so this must be 12. The calculation of birth date in the Death Reg'n. is the 11th - so close.2,3,4,7,8,6

Marriage*: 30 November 1904; Northumberland Co., Ontario; Marriage Reg'n.#013413: Groom: Sylvester Wambold; Age: 27; Res.: Brighton; Born: Saugeen; Status: bachelor; Occ.: salesman; Parents: John W. Wambold & Susanna Bechtel; Bride: Nellie Gertrude Steenburg; Age: 20; Res.: Brighton; Born: Prince Edward Co.; Status: spinster; Parents: George Steenburg & Alfretta Kemp; Wit.: ... Date: Nov 30 1904; Place: Northumberland Co.; (Ontario Marriage Registration, #013413-1904, ancestry.com); Principal=Sylvester Wambold9

Death*: 31 October 1907; South River, Parry Sound Dist., Ontario; Death Reg'n.#023631: Name: Nellie Gertrude Wambold; Date: Oct 31 1907; Age: 23y 5m 20d; Res.: South River; Occ.: housewife; Status: married; Husband: Sylvester Wambold; Born: Odessa, Ont.; Cause: tuberculosis, 4 mo.; Phys. & Inf.: Dr. R. H. Dillane; Rel.: P.; Reg'd.: Nov 1 1907; Reg'r.: H. O'Bourne?, South River Village, Parry Sound Dist. (Ontario Death Registration, #023631-1907, ancestry.com) Date Oct 31 1907 per Memorial.3,10

Burial*: 3 November 1907; McPhail's Cemetery, Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Memorial: (See Exhibit) Nellie Gertrude Steenburg; Wife of Sylvester Wambold; Born May 18, 1884 - Died Oct 31, 1907 (McPhail's Cemetery, Brighton Twp.)3

Census*: April 1891; Brighton Twp., Northumberland Co., Ontario; Age 7 at 1891 Census: see George Steenburg8

Census: 9 April 1901; Hope Twp., Durham East Co., Ontario; Age 16 at 1901 Census: see Charles J. Steenburgh (an uncle)6

Residence*: 30 November 1904; Brighton, Northumberland Co., Ontario; Residence Brighton per marr. reg'n.2

Married Name: 30 November 1904; Wambold2

Family: Sylvester Wambold b. 1877

Marriage*: 30 November 1904; Northumberland Co., Ontario; Marriage Reg'n.#013413: Groom: Sylvester Wambold; Age: 27; Res.: Brighton; Born: Saugeen; Status: bachelor; Occ.: salesman; Parents: John W. Wambold & Susanna Bechtel; Bride: Nellie Gertrude Steenburg; Age: 20; Res.: Brighton; Born: Prince Edward Co.; Status: spinster; Parents: George Steenburg & Alfretta Kemp; Wit.: ... Date: Nov 30 1904; Place: Northumberland Co.; (Ontario Marriage Registration, #013413-1904, ancestry.com); Principal=Sylvester Wambold9

Citations

Nellie Gertrude Steenburg per Memorial & per Marriage Reg'. & per Birth Reg'n. Nellie G. Steenburg per 1901 Census - living with uncle Charles.
